description:
Rubixi (shared/access_control/rubixi/rubixi_4round.sol#3-143) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- participants.push(Participant(msg.sender,(msg.value * pyramidMultiplier) / 100)) (shared/access_control/rubixi/rubixi_4round.sol#49)

Rubixi.collectPercentOfFees(uint256) (shared/access_control/rubixi/rubixi_4round.sol#84-89) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- feesToCollect = collectedFees / 100 * _pcent (shared/access_control/rubixi/rubixi_4round.sol#86)
